title: Kayn Champion Difficultly (BUG) ???
body:
is this a BUG ?? or riot did this on purpose ?
it says on champion kayn info in client. 
Kayn Champion Difficultly 0/3  
does this mean kayn is so EASY that it can not even pass 1 / 3 
or no one in riot notice this and didnt bother to fix it 
if so what is kayn difficultly ? 3/3 ?
or is it going to stay 0/3
so i dont have to check it every 2 hours just to see if it updated.
thanks.

replies.body: Ayyyyyy thanks for the heads up! Sometimes little things like that might slip through the cracks xD. I'll be sure to pass this along to right people, but you should definitely post this over on the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) section to make sure the devs catch it!
